law.catch_line: Notwithstanding any provision of law, a savings and loan association, holding company, or subsidiary...
law.text: Notwithstanding any provision of law, a savings and loan association, holding company, or subsidiary may not indemnify any person who is fined under any criminal penalty provision of this title or Title 8 of this article or subject to any civil penalty under this title or Title 8 of this article.
